title: Capturing electronic patient reported outcomes in oncology practice. - ASCO Publications

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 67% of patients completed assessments, reducing discontinuation risk by 30%.
**TACTICAL WIN [ROADMAP]**: Integrate patient-facing dashboards for real-time tracking and engagement.

**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias may skew results toward healthier patients, affecting clinical validity.
